intro: Psychotria lindenii, commonly known as the Amazonian Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly the Amazon rainforest. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, dark blue to black berries that are edible but have a mild, somewhat bitter taste. Psychotria lindenii is often found in moist, shaded understory habitats within dense forest environments.
